meanings.sent1: The towel felt dampish after being left out in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The grass was dampish from the morning dew.
meanings.sent3: The dampish socks made her feet feel squishy.
meanings.sent4: The dampish air clung to her skin like a cool mist.
meanings.sent5: The dampish cloth absorbed the spilled water quickly.

meanings.sent1: His dampish hair showed he had just showered.
meanings.sent2: The soil in the garden was dampish after the light rain.
meanings.sent3: The dampish sandwich became soggy in his backpack.
meanings.sent4: Her dampish cheeks glistened in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The dampish sponge soaked up the spilled juice effortlessly.
